description:
The final set of the finals. Haruka and Kanata are at match point and Haruka hits a jump topspin serve! Which pair will end up going to the nationals?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: And That`s Why We Choose Our Irreplaceable Partners
Dakara Watashitachi wa, Kakegae no Nai Hitori o Erabu
Le choix du partenaire est crucial
だから私たちは, かけがえのない一人を選ぶ
